name: The Full Ass - Iris Mod
description:
This Mod Is Called The Full Ass - Iris Mod! Even Though The Name Has A Bad Word In It, There Is No Bad Words In The Game. This Game Is About Completing Challenges, To Unlock New Badges And Weeks!

You Can Also Customize Characters, Items Like Microphones, And More!

You Can Create Accounts, To Save Your Medals, And Badges! Collect All Of Your Badges For Real Life Rewards And Promotion! You Can Create Your Own Characters And Make New Songs And Custom Weeks! Draw And Animate Your Characters And Publish Them So Anyone Can Play!

With Publishing Your Games, Your Friends Can Search Your Game, And Host Multiplayer 1v1 Games!  

You Can Also Friend People And Add Them To Your "Friends List " So You Can Join Anyone's Game At Anytime, And View There Created Games! You Can Turn Offline Mode And People Cannot Access Your Account! 

You Can Also Report People, And Chat With People Your In The Game With, And On Your Friends List! You Can Play Solo Games,  Your Game, Kick People Out Of Your Game , And Make It Private! 

We Will Work Are Hardest To Create New Weeks For You Guys To Play! With New Crossover Characters Like Milez, Iris, Shiny, Irco, And More!

Jump Into Iris Mod On June 30th For The Paid Only Demo! The Full Ass - Iris Mod Demo Comes Out On August 10th! And The Free Full Ass - Game Comes Out August 20! (Sorry For The Delay!) - You Can Get The Early Access Demo While We Are Still Working On It, But There Will Be ALOT Of Bugs!
